```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

setwd("~/NSL-KDD")
```



```{r}
kdd_train <- readRDS('data/interim/kdd_train.RDS')
```



```{r}
kdd_train %>%
  group_by(Class) %>%
  summarize(Total = n(),
            Proportion = n() / nrow(kdd_train))
```

Overall the amount of normal and attack connections are  proportion of *R2L* and *U2R* connections are much lower than the other connection types.


## Correlations

```{r}
kdd_train_cors <- kdd_train %>%
  mutate(across(everything(), as.numeric)) %>%
  cor(method = 'spearman')

corrplot(kdd_train_cors)
```
